product_name: Salewa Pro Guide Insulated Mountaineering Boots - Men's
long_description: Seek new ascents with the Salewa Pro Guide Insulated Mountaineering boots, which provide excellent comfort and waterproof protection for 4-season mixed alpine pursuits and ice climbing. 3mm Perwanger leather uppers are paired with polyamide fabric panels to offer highly abrasion-resistant performance with good flexibility; full rubber rand for protection. Breathable Gore-Tex(R) membranes allow vapor transmission out of boots yet stop water from reaching feet; nylon inner linings wick moisture away from feet. Gore-Tex Duratherm synthetic insulation is bonded to the membrane, offering lightweight warmth and breathability without bulk. Salewa 3F System Evo fit supports the ankles without decreasing motion and foward movement. Removable EVA insoles offering support and cushioning. Nylon/fiberglass shanks provide support and torsional rigidity for comfort over the long-haul, and stiffness when ice climbing. Flex System allows you to stiffen the soles while on the go; choose from either climb or walk mode. Salewa Pro Guide Insulated mountaineering boots boast durable Vibram rubber outsoles for great all-around performance.
short_description: Seek new ascents with the Salewa Pro Guide Insulated Mountaineering boots, which provide excellent comfort and waterproof protection for 4-season mixed alpine pursuits and ice climbing.
